chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall s1 s2 : set, incls s2 s1 -> (card (set_minus s1 s2) + card s2)%nat = card s1

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
set_minus = fix set_minus (s1 s2 : set) {struct s1} : set := match s1 with | Vs => Vs | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s2 x then set_minus s0 s2 else Is (set_minus s0 s2) x end : set -> set -> set
Inductive incls (s1 s2 : set) : Prop := exds2 : (forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> incls s1 s2 For exds2: Argument scopes are [_ _ function_scope]
Inductive set : Set := Vs : set | Is : set -> dart -> set
card = fix card (s : set) : nat := match s with | Vs => 0%nat | Is s0 x => if exds_dec s0 x then card s0 else (1 + card s0)%nat end : set -> nat
exds2 : forall s1 s2 : set, (forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> incls s1 s2
exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z -> ~ exds s2 z -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
not_exds_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s1 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
exds_set_minus_eq : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s1 z /\ ~ exds s2 z < -> exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
set_minus_s_Ds : forall (s1 s2 : set) (x : dart), ~ exds s1 x -> exds s2 x -> set_minus s1 (Ds s2 x) = set_minus s1 s2
not_exds_set_minus : forall (s1 s2 : set) (z : dart), exds s2 z -> ~ exds (set_minus s1 s2) z
incls_rect : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Type), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
incls_ind : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Prop), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
incls_rec : forall (s1 s2 : set) (P : Set), ((forall z : dart, exds s1 z -> exds s2 z) -> P) -> incls s1 s2 -> P
exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = (card s - 1)%nat
exds_card_Ds_inf : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (card (Ds s z) < card s)%nat
card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), (card (Ds s z) <= card s)%nat
not_exds_card_Ds : forall (s : set) (z : dart), ~ exds s z -> card (Ds s z) = card s
nd_card : forall m : fmap, ndN m = card (fmap_to_set m)
exds_card_pos : forall (s : set) (z : dart), exds s z -> (0 < card s)%nat
set_rec : forall P : set -> Set, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_ind : forall P : set -> Prop, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
set_rect : forall P : set -> Type, P Vs -> (forall s : set, P s -> forall d : dart, P (Is s d)) -> forall s : set, P s
not_exds_Vs : forall s : set, (forall z : dart, ~ exds s z) -> s = Vs
Zegal_left : forall n m : Z, n = m -> n + - m = 0
plus_is_one : forall m n : nat, (m + n)%nat = 1%nat -> {m = 0%nat /\ n = 1%nat} + {m = 1%nat /\ n = 0%nat}
Nat.add_nocarry_lxor : forall a b : nat, Nat.land a b = 0%nat -> (a + b)%nat = Nat.lxor a b
Z2Nat.inj_add : forall n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Z.to_nat (n + m) = (Z.to_nat n + Z.to_nat m)%nat
Z2N.inj_add : forall n m : Z, 0 <= n -> 0 <= m -> Z.to_N (n + m) = (Z.to_N n + Z.to_N m)%N
List.partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), List.partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = (length l1 + length l2)%nat
OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, 0 <= x -> y = 0 -> 0 <= x + y * z
f_equal_nat : forall (B : Type) (f : nat -> B) (x y : nat), x = y -> f x = f y
tech5 : forall (An : nat -> R) (N : nat), sum_f_R0 An (S N) = (sum_f_R0 An N + An (S N))%R
eq_add_S : forall n m : nat, S n = S m -> n = m
inj_eq : forall x y : nat, x = y -> Z.of_nat x = Z.of_nat y
